name: Vinland Saga
about: Around the end of the millennium, Viking, the mightiest but atrocious tribe, had been outbreaking everywhere. Thorfinn, the son of the greatest warrior, lived his childhood in the battlefield. He was seeking the land of reverie called Vinland. This is the story of a true warrior in an age of turmoil.Source: Amazon
tags: , Action, Seinen, Death of a Loved One, England, Europe, Historical, Medieval, Revenge, Swordplay, War, Weak to Strong, Based on a Manga, Violence,
